alert.note: Alert for Wahkiakum (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 01 at 3:25PM PST until March 02 at 6:40PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oregon... Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington... Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. Cowlitz River at Kelso affecting Cowlitz County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Grays River near Rosburg. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...Above 14.0 feet, expect widespread lowland flooding and numerous flooded roads near Rosburg and Hwy 4. This includes the roadway approaches to the Altoona Bridge over the Grays River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM PST Tuesday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM PST Tuesday was 15.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon and continue falling through the week. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 10 PM PST.
